case.title: Ready to find Mr Right to spend my life with - 36 (Brooklyn)
case.text:
I'm a 36 year old black female. I'm looking to find that LTR that turns into marriage.
You should be tall (6' or taller), have a sense of humor, between 35-50 years old and ready to develop a lasting relationship.
Let's email/text/chat and see if there is a possible connection.
